group_1.textCenter: I made it to Mitakihara City...!
Oh, I knew it was you, Iroha!

group_1.textLeft: Anyway, what brings you to Mitakihara?

group_1.textRight: Erm... There's something I need to pick up,@basically...

group_1.textLeft: ...I see, you're buying some confectionaries@on Yachiyo's behalf.
If you want, I can take you to that shop.

group_1.textRight: It seemed like you had someplace to be,@though.

group_1.textLeft: No, I'm through with my errands.
I was just on my way home after picking up@some stationery.

group_1.textRight: Huh, so this is the road you take to school?

group_1.textLeft: Yep, my house is right nearby, so I walk@to school from here.

group_1.narration: ―Madoka's Brother―@Ah! Big Sis!
―Madoka's Mother―@You don't seem to be from the same school.@Is she a friend of yours?
―Madoka―@Yeah! I've told you guys about Iroha -@this is her!
―Madoka's Mother―@Ah, yes, the one from Kamihama!
―Madoka's Mother―@I'm Madoka's mother.@It's a pleasure to meet you, Iroha.
―Madoka's Mother―@This is her father, and@that's her little brother, Tatsuya.
―Madoka's Brother―@Uuh...?
―Madoka's Father―@Thank you for being such a@good friend to Madoka.
―Iroha―@Oh, no...!@She's the one you should be praising.
―Iroha―@Ah, right, I should introduce myself...
―Iroha―@My name is Iroha Tamaki!@It's very nice to meet you.
―Madoka's Brother―@...Roha?
―Iroha―@That's right, Iroha.@Pleased to meet you, Tatsuya.
―Madoka's Brother―@Rohaaa! Y'know...umm...
―Iroha―@Yes? What is it?
―Madoka's Mother―@Are you a fan of kids?
―Iroha―@Yes, they're so cute!
―Iroha―@*Giggle* He reminds me of when@Ui was little...
―Madoka―@Ui is her little sister.@She's in elementary school now.
―Madoka's Mother―@That makes you both big sisters, then!
―Madoka―@That's just what I was thinking!
―Iroha―@Yeah, I never really noticed it@before, but we are.
―Madoka's Mother―@Haha! Hey, Madoka.
―Madoka's Mother―@She's come all this way, why don't you@invite her to come visit our house?
―Iroha―@Huh? But it's so sudden...@Wouldn't I be intruding?
―Madoka's Mother―@Not a bit. Please, come on over!
―Madoka's Brother―@Roha! Home!
―Madoka's Father―@Looks like Tatsuya's eager to play@with you guys, if that's okay with you.
―Madoka―@Yeah! Why don't we stop by after we visit@that confectionery shop?
―Iroha―@In that case...then sure thing!
―Madoka's Mother―@The confectionery shop?
―Madoka―@Yeah, that Japanese-style shop right down@the street - the one you really like.
―Madoka's Mother―@I see... Yes, the goods they sell are@wonderful, especially the monaka!
―Iroha―@Those sandwich cookies?@They seem popular!
―Iroha―@That's what I was asked@to purchase, too.
―Madoka's Mother―@You'd better get a move on, then.
―Madoka's Mother―@The monaka are very popular - they sell out@in a flash!
―Iroha―@Oh no...!
―Madoka―@We have to hurry!@See you later, everyone!
―Madoka's Mother―@Right, take care!
